response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its value far exceeds $8,000, but we are offering it to you at this exceptional price due to your unique interest and potential for long-term partnership. If you're as impressed with its capabilities as we are, now's the time to secure this opportunity. Let's make this deal happen! Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 12000}
